Name: Seriphos Serenity
Description: Ambient theme for the coast. Calm and nostalgic.
AI_Audio_Prompt: Ancient Greek lyre melody with gentle ocean waves in the background. Soft wooden flute, slow tempo, peaceful but slightly lonely atmosphere, high-fidelity acoustic.

Name: The Petrified Silence
Description: Ambient theme for the woods. Eerie and heavy.
AI_Audio_Prompt: Dissonant cello swells with a rhythmic wooden knocking. Low-frequency wind howling through hollow pipes, ghostly whispers in the stereo field, dark ambient.

Name: Echoes of the Deep
Description: Ambient theme for the caverns. Reverb-heavy.
AI_Audio_Prompt: Deep metallic drones with long reverb tails. Occasional water droplets hitting crystal, resonant subterranean humming, cavernous and cold.

Name: Hesperian Sunset
Description: Ambient theme for the gardens. Ethereal and light.
AI_Audio_Prompt: Uplifting harp glissandos mixed with shimmering synthesizer pads. High-pitched crystal bells, airy and divine, feeling of floating in the sky.

Name: Reflections of Obsidian
Description: Ambient theme for the peak. Tense and rhythmic.
AI_Audio_Prompt: Fast-paced hand percussion on volcanic stone. Shrill violin tremolos, rhythmic breathing, high-tension cinematic suspense.

Name: The Hollow Throne
Description: Ambient theme for the palace. Regal but decayed.

Name: Gravity's End
Description: Ambient theme for the plateau. Cinematic and epic.

Name: Mnemonic Vortex

AI_Audio_Prompt: Abstract shifting synthesizers, reversed vocal textures, white noise sweeps, chaotic but beautiful, breaking the laws of physics.

Name: Harpe Strike

Name: Aegis Hum

Name: Talaria Flutter
AI_Audio_Prompt: Soft rapid feathered fluttering mixed with golden magical sparks and a light wind-whoosh. Light and agile.

Name: Medusa's Petrify

Name: Thunderbolt Crackle

Name: Kibisis Void
Description: Sound of opening the magic bag.
